set_guest_wifi_password.description: Sets a new password for the guest Wi-Fi. The password must be between 8 and 63 characters long. If no additional parameter is set, the password will be auto-generated with a length of 12 characters.

length.description: Length of the new password. It will be auto-generated if no password is set.
length.name: Password length

password.description: New password for the guest Wi-Fi.
password.name: Password
